congratulations.title: Your registration was successful.
congratulations.paragraph1: You are now a founding member of the Chainpass ID - VAIRIFY community! We're thrilled to extend an invitation for you to access the full-featured beta versions of our sites, enhanced with V.A.I. Technology. Experience the world's safest and most advanced platforms at no cost while you share your feedback that will make the official launch of the V.A.I. community the safest community in the world even better.
congratulations.paragraph2: Simply check the boxes below, and we will keep you informed

terms.title: TERMS AND CONDITIONS
terms.para1: These Terms and Conditions constitute a legally binding agreement made between you, whether personally or on behalf of an entity (“you”) and Vairify.Date ("Company", “we”, “us”, or “our”), concerning your access to and use of the Vairify.Date website as well as any other media form, media channel, mobile website or mobile application related, linked, or otherwise connected thereto (collectively, the “Site”). You agree that by accessing the Site, you have read, understood, and agreed to be bound by all of these Terms and Conditions.
terms.para2: Supplemental terms and conditions or documents that may be posted on the Site from time to time are hereby expressly incorporated herein by reference. We will alert you about any changes by updating the “Last updated” date of these Terms and Conditions, and you waive any right to receive specific notice of each such change. It is your responsibility to periodically review these Terms and Conditions to stay informed of updates. You will be subject to and will be deemed to have been made aware of and to have accepted, the changes in any revised Terms and Conditions by your continued use of the Site after the date such revised Terms and Conditions are posted.

migration.title: Migration Special
migration.tagline: Exclusive limited-time offer: Unlock the TruRevu special at sign-up - one-time eligibility only!
migration.description1: We will assign an agent to gather your reviews on the web and assign them to your TruRevu. This grand opening special will only be available 60 days from our opening
migration.description2: “It's your reputation — TruRevu will help you take control of it”
